message: So... I guess creating a topic is just creating a title and the member chat within said title composes the topic.
Looks that way. Like campfire but with more pretty.
Not bad for launch day! It's starting to feel more and more like there needs to be an app the day a site launches these days though, but I guess that means you
So it's not mobile optimised but they have only just launched so maybe a mobile version or an app is on the way. There is already an API after all.
yeah, I'd prefer a web app for most things but it depends on the features. I feel a native app would suit this better - for push notifications and feature functionality etc.
Definitely more pretty. The private groups look decent too, with ability to create invite codes etc.
Any idea how it plays with iPhone?
Not a clue. Will try now though!
are waiting on apple to review your app, etc.
There is a good iPhone app in the AppStore now :)
